title: Major AI Breakthrough in Reasoning
content: Researchers at a leading AI lab have demonstrated a new reasoning capability that significantly outperforms previous benchmarks. The system uses a novel architecture that combines chain-of-thought with verification steps.

title: EU-China Trade Tensions Escalate
content: The European Union has announced new tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles, escalating trade tensions. China has threatened retaliatory measures targeting European agricultural exports.

title: Federal Reserve Holds Rates Steady
content: The Federal Reserve kept interest rates unchanged at its latest meeting, signaling a wait-and-see approach amid mixed economic signals. Markets reacted positively to the decision.
